snippet: To the Editor:    Abigail Thernstrom's argument against California's expansion of scholarships for needy students who perform well in high school (Op-Ed, Sept. 26) demonstrates elitism and defeatism....
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Abigail Thernstrom's argument against California's expansion of scholarships for needy students who perform well in high school (Op-Ed, Sept. 26) demonstrates elitism and defeatism.
abstract: Letter by California education official John Mockler says Abigail Thernstrom's opposition to expanding scholarships for needy students who perform well in high school (Sept 26 Op-Ed) demonstrates elitism and defeatism (S)
